objects.name: Intructions
objects.string:
1. Arrow keys to move
2. "X" to interact, Next dialogue, Confirm, Close Dialogue
3. "C" to skip dialogue
4. "Space" to save info
5. "T" to reload scene
6. "R" to reset everything
7. For more obvious results, refresh browser, or if downloaded, close the program and open it again.

events.comment:
It is beyond important to have "x" here as released.
What it does: It won't clash with "x" (pressed) to start dialogue and will close the dialogue as intended.

This must be above "text" here
Must have a different keybind for *now*
Must have trigger once.
It works...as far as I know lmao.

parameters: "Game: Can't save while dialogue is running"
